ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (6 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "Oranges, pineapple, cottage cheese and whipped topping combine for a fully refreshing slightly sweet salad. My mom always makes this recipe and the reason I call it 'Anytime Fruit Salad'  is because if there is any ever left I eat it anytime."
ins: In a large bowl, combine the cottage cheese, whipped topping and gelatin mix. Stir in the oranges and pineapple. Chill in refrigerator.
